1.content:
It was a beautiful day outside. The sky was bright blue, not a cloud in sight. The birds were chirping away in joy. People were stopping to smell the flowers and such. It was a very peaceful time.

"Come ON!"

It was an almost peaceful time.

Nancy glared at the little vermin in the sink. "You disgusting little twat! I oughta bleach you right now and just get rid of you!"

The little piece of dried-on egg innocently stayed silent. She sighed; it felt like it was looking at her with puppy dog eyes.

"Fine. Fine! You win!" She dropped the plate back into the soapy water and ripped off her rubber gloves. "But mark my words, I will come back for you, after you've learned your lesson while soaking."

She whipped around and stormed out of the kitchen, glancing around the flat, trying to think of something else to do as she waited. It was the middle of May, and of course, that meant it was time for Spring Cleaning, her favorite time of the year.

A thought pricked her mind all of a sudden of something that hadn't yet reached her disinfected hands- her clubhouse. She grinned mischievously and walked to her bedroom, where the quarter dome filled with various holes stood, screwed into the wall and filled with pillows. It was her place to hang out, and maybe keep her little fetish ablaze. She loved to just sometimes take some of the leftovers she got from the bakery she worked at and just sit in there and gorge with music sometimes, thus leading to the insane amount of crumbs she could imagine were just waiting for her in there. Quickly, she ran off and returned, this time with a hand broom and dustpan in hand.

"Alright, crumbs," she mumbled, "Prepare yourselves."

But first, she had to make a choice- there were multiple ways to get in.

The first one, the easiest, was a circular hole near the middle, and towards the bottom. It would be the quickest way to get in to annihilate those crumbs, but a little bit boring.

The second one was a dog door type hole. It was rectangular; it was higher than it was wide. It resided about a foot away from the first. It was often a bit of a challenge for her to get through, but she could usually make it with minimal pushing.

The third was a mail-slot kind of hole- wider than it was tall. It was at the top right of the first one. This was one of her favorites, because she could get somewhat wedged in and need a fair amount of pushing to get through with herself alone, and when she would put a pillow up her shirt or something, it was nearly impossible.

The fourth was near the top, and it was a simple, small square. She had always been a little bit nervous to try this one; last time she had done so, she had gotten wedged good and proper, with no pillows or anything. It had taken her quite a bit to get out, and the only reason she had was because she had started to panic about being found out, and the adrenaline gave her the strength to get out.

Eventually, she decided to go for the...
1.title: Cleaning Time

choices: to try the doggy door hole
to try the mail slot hole
to go out and get a pillow
11.content: Nancy eventually decided that she had no time to indulge her fetish, and so chose the easiest hole, in the form of the circular hole. She slipped inside with ease and set about cleaning up the crumbs in the clubhouse. The blankets, pillows and cushions in the room were also dirty, so she pushed them into the hole and out to her bedroom floor. The empty clubhouse brought back memories of her escapades, and she soon found herself wanting to try for a tight squeeze. She turned to the holes and decided...
11.title: Middle, Circular!

115.content: After a few moments of thought, Nancy decided to do something different. She climbed out of the circular hole and thought again. She then decided...
115.title: to go do something else

1153.content:
Nancy's stomach let out a low growl; cleaning the house as quickly as she had had given her quite the appetite. Being in the clubhouse had given her a craving for sweet treats, so she pulled on her shoes and coat, and grabbed her purse before heading out to her favourite bakery and sweet shop. The older man behind the counter smiled as she entered the shop.

"Hey, if it isn't Nancy!" he said enthusiastically.

"Hi, Mr Selick," she smiled at her boss.

"Nancy, you're not meant to be in today," Selick said. "You took holiday this week, remember?"

"Yes, I remember," Nancy smiled. "But I just have this craving, and I know only one place which can satisfy it."

"Well, if you're here as a customer, what can I get you?" Selick as cheerfully.

Nancy looked thoughtfully at the display and ordered...
1153.title: to get some treats

11532.content: Knowing both how hungry she was, and how very nice the treats she was buying were, Nancy finally settled on her bulk order; a few jars of boiled sweets, a couple of large chocolate bars, and lots of Mr Selick's signature pastries. After paying and bidding farewell to Mr Selick, Nancy headed back to her home, and...
11532.title: Her bulk order (large size)

115322.content: Once she was inside, Nancy quickly hurried up to her bedroom, placed new pillows and blanket inside the clubhouse, and then put her treats inside, and then climbed in with a book to while away the time as she often did whilst snacking. She opened her novel, and a jar of sweets, and began to relax.
115322.title: got in without trouble

choices: to take a nap in the clubhouse.
to climb out and continue cleaning.
1153221.content: Several hours later, Nancy's appetite had been sated, and in more ways than one; she had read the remainder of her novel, which had ended in an unexpected but great way, but she was also feeling rather stuffed from her snack binge; despite it being her large order, the pile of treats had drastically decreased to only a third of its original size. This was obvious if one was to look at Nancy now; her stomach bulged out in front, poking out from under her shirt ever so slightly, and her bottom and hips had also swelled with the sugary treats she had consumed. Finally, after sitting there for a few moments longer, Nancy decided...
1153221.title: Some time later...

11532211.content: Being so very full, Nancy was feeling understandably lethargic, and so decided, since the clubhouse had fresh pillows and covers, to settle down to sleep. She pushed the remaining treats and her novel through one of the holes to make space for herself to lay down. Soon, in the warmth and comfort of the clubhouse, Nancy fell fast asleep.
11532211.title: to take a nap in the clubhouse.

11532212.content:
Feeling that she had spent long enough in the clubhouse, Nancy decided it was time to leave the clubhouse and return to her duties around the house. She turned to her things, removing them from the clubhouse first, before then sticking her arms through the round hole she had come in through, and set off forward.

Nancy pulled with her arms and pushed with her legs, and in a while her head was back in her bedroom. She pushed and pushed, and out came her shoulders, and then her chest, then the top of her tummy, and then...

"Huh?" Nancy questioned, confused as she pushed forwards and did not fit. The hole was tight, tighter than ever before, and initially she did not know why. However, looking down to her bloated belly, she soon understood. "Oh bother. This isn't the time for this!" She pushed again, harder this time, but to no avail. "Nngh! Come on!"

Try as she might, Nancy could not pull herself forwards and out of the hole. She began to consider going back...
11532212.title: to climb out and continue cleaning.

115322121.content: Stubborn, and wanting to finish what she had started, Nancy pushed harder and harder on the wall of the clubhouse. She pushed with her legs and pulled with her arms, she sucked in her tummy and wriggled, and soon...
115322121.title: No! Keep trying!

choices: She was unable to pull forward any further!
1153221211.content: Redoubling her efforts, feeling urged onward by her progress up to her belly button, Nancy pushed and pulled with all her might. After several long minutes of pushing...
1153221211.title: She budged!

115322122.content: Feeling that the largest hole was a problem to get through, Nancy decided to pull herself back out, after a bit of a struggle, and try another hole. After a moment of pondering, she chose to go with...
115322122.title: Maybe another hole...

1153221222.content: Which of the other holes does Nancy choose?
1153221222.title: Another hole!

11532212222.content: Nancy decided, against her better judgement, to try the smallest hole of the bunch again. She climbed up to the hole and pushed her arms through. She could barely fit her head and shoulders through, but she managed it. She pushed with all her might, struggling for twenty minutes before her breasts came through the hole. She breathed a sigh of relief as she got this far, and pushed again, but she did not move at all; her stomach was tightly pressed to the hole but would not move! Nancy gulped and pushed, struggling this way and that, but it was no use; she was stuck tighter than ever in the hole. She could no even budge backwards, leaving her only one choice in her mind...
11532212222.title: Nancy gets in a very tight spot

choices: Sit on the hamper and rest.
Put them in the hamper and walk down to the laundry room.
15.content:
Nancy suddenly remembered-she had take care of the laundry and get it in the machine.

"Hern....Well crumbs, you have a reprieve....but not for long!" she cried, whipping around and storming to the bathroom, her rear swaying with each step.

Inside the bathroom, she scowled. She'd let her clothes pile up too much. Bras, shorts, shirts, all of it sprawled on the floor and out of the spilled hamper. Standing up the wicker basket, she closed it's thin lid and surveyed the room. She could put all the clothes in the hamper and carry it down, or drop it down the laundry chute. The latter was faster, but her clothes tended to get caught on loose metal. Nancy huffed again as she remembered the last time-she'd reached in to get them loose, then spent 20 minutes trying to back of it. A bit fun, but dizzy as well.

Looking down at the hamper, she contemplated sitting on it and resting. Surely the lid could hold her.

And with that, she...
15.title: Door, and do something else!

info.brief_description: Nancy decides to clean a clubhouse in her flat that may be just a tad too small now...
info.description:
Profile
Name: Nancy Pond
Age: 23
Hair: Boy-cut, beach blonde
Eyes: Hazel
Chest: Just above average
Waist: relatively thin
Hips/Butt: Above average
Background: Living by herself in a flat and plans to for a while. She works at a bakery, thus gets to bring home sweet on a regular basis. Has a stuckage fetish, so she loves to stick herself in places and try to get out in multiple ways, including shoving a pillow up her shirt and such to make it harder. Likes things to be clean, neat, and tidy, though doesn't mind gorging out on food sometimes.

Rules
-Nancy must get stuck at some point in each path. Come on, man, it's a stuckage story. Are you really going to try me?
-Please, whatever happens, no sex. It's PG13. THINK OF THE CHILDREN.
-Wanna add someone? Sure, whatever. It's interactive and unfinished for a reason. Do whatever you want (just no sex and she's gotta get wedged at some point or another).

Kay? Kay. Here we go!
